description:
I got a pretty happy response when I added Rocco to the site.
I got lots of emails saying "Service that dude!"
Now as much I would love to suck that cock, I knew I had tons of vids of me sucking dick on the shelves, and I wanted somebody with a hot body out there working him over.
I gave in and went with the tried-and-true Massage table theme. The minute I saw Rocco's hot body, I knew I didn't want him just laying in bed getting his cock sucked. I wanted to showcase his muscles and that amazing bubble butt. I know, every site out there has one, but it has all kinds of advantages.
A week earlier Race was in for a massage table vid with another model (Airing in a couple weeks) and he did such a great job I asked him to come right on back and Service Rocco.
Rocco was nervous, but his dick sure was interested in getting sucked! We kept Race's underwear on just so it wouldn't freak him out, so in many ways this IS a Serviced video.
After the shoot, Rocco wanted to know what more he could do, but still only wants his dick sucked. ~sigh~ So I may ask him to come back and do an Edge video, but I think it would have to be a very straightforward scene (ie no fantasy stuff) to get him more comfortable.
We'll see if keeps coming back. I sure do like working with him!
title: Race & Rocco - Serviced
